title: The Three Short Novels in One Volume
description: Payback, One Sexual Season and the new Karolina Diaries book 1Germaine Gibson offers her three top stories bundled here for the first time in one publicationStories that go inside the mind of various women as they experience for the first time the true nature of love loss and physical desire.Some of the women are damaged, some are stuck, some are angry - but in every case the direct spare language takes you to the heart of a woman finding herself in the world of husbands, men and 'marks's reviewers have said - direct, hot, arousing - and in the end stories that are true and satisfying.Discover the world of germaine gibson and the women that tell her their deep heartfelt stories
author: Germaine Gibson
